name: Throne
blurb: Throne is a fantasy mix of Role Playing and Fighting video game genres, with vibrant playable characters directly influenced by you!

rewards.reward: In Game Content Package: (A), and a special thanks in the game credits!                                                \r\n\r\n(SEE DETAILS BELOW STRETCH GOALS FOR INFORMATION ON ALL IN GAME CONTENT PACKAGES!)

Digital Soundtrack of Throne, In Game Content Package(A)


Special Thanks in the Credits

Free copy of Throne, Digital Soundtrack of Throne, In Game Content Package (B)


Special Thanks in the Credits

-Access to Multi Player Beta, Free Copy of Throne, In Game Content Package: (B)
Your choice of T-Shirt.


Special Thanks in the Credits
Everything above, plus In Game Content Package: (C), your choice of signed Throne print T-shirt, voting rights on future expansion character classes,\r\nSpecial Thanks in the Credits

COLLECTOR\u2019S DIGITAL ONLY TIER \u2013 all digital rewards \u2013 DIGITAL COPY OF THE GAME + DIGITAL COPY OF THE SOUNDTTRACK + EARLY BETA ACCESS KEY + DIGITAL WALL PAPER + THANK YOU POSTCARD CREATED BY ALEX WHITE AND SIGNED BY THE ENTIRE DEVELOPING TEAM + SPECIAL THANKS IN THE GAME CREDITS.  If you are looking for all the rewards of the Collector\u2019s Edition, but do not need the physical goods, then this is a great reward tier for you.

Previous reward tier + 2 DIGITAL COPIES OF THE GAME + DIGITAL COPY OF THE THRONE MAP \u2013 LEVEL 1 + YOUR CHOICE OF T-SHIRT (not including the Limited Edition T-shirt of The Knight) SIGNED BY THE ENTIRE DEVELOPMENT TEAM + A THRONE MOUSE PAD

$250 \u2013 DIGITAL ONLY TIER \u2013 All rewards from the previous digital tier + 1 MORE DIGITAL COPY OF THE GAME (you get 2 total) + 1 MORE DIGITAL COPY OF THE SOUNDTRACK (you get 2 total) + DIGITL COPY OF THE THRONE MAP-Level I + NAME AND DESIGN A CITY OF YOUR CHOICE.  If you are looking for all the rewards of the Collector\u2019s Edition, but do not need the physical goods, then this is a great reward tier for you.

Previous reward tier + THRONE NOBLE STEED (only ten available) + SET OF THRONE CHARACTER CARDS + LANYARD + KEY CHAIN + 2 T-SHIRTS OF YOUR CHOICE (not including the Limited Edition T-shirt of The Knight)  + THRONE BOOKMARK + Your own statue in the city of Throne for everyone to see!

Previous reward tier + A COLLECTOR'S EDITION OF THE AUTHOGRAPHED CLOTH MAP OF THRONE LEVEL 1 + A DIGITAL COPY OF THRONE MAP - LEVEL II + 1 THRONE CAP + AN ORIGINAL DRAWING CREATED AND SIGNED BY ALEX WHITE. The cloth map will be numbered and signed by the entire team of Throne artists; it will be a limited edition of 25, and only available to the Kickstarter backers.

$750 - Previous reward tier + A COLLECTOR'S EDITION WOOD BOX + CLOTH MAP OF THRONE LEVEL I AND LEVEL II BOTH NUMBERED AND SIGNED BY THE ENTIRE THRONE TEAM + A COLLECTOR'S EDITION THRONE CLOTH PATCH EMBROIDERED + A DIGITAL COPY OF THE SECOND PART OF THRONE TRILOGY - THRONE LEGEND.  Throne Legend will be the second game of the Throne Trilogy, the third part will be Throne Bizantis, to be created if we reach the stretch goals we need.

Previous reward tier + COLECTOR'S EDITION BOX SIGNED BY THRONE TEAM + AN SIGNED ELITE VERSION OF THE CLOTH THRONE MAP - LEVEL I AND II + A PRINTED COLLECTOR'S EDITION THRONE BOOK INCLUDING SKETCHES, CONCEPT ART, AND EXCLUSIVE INFORMATION ABOUT THE CREATION OF THRONE signed by Alex White + A 3D VERSION OF A THRONE CARACTHER + VIP THANK YOU NOTE IN THE GAME CREDITS

Previous reward tier + 2 THRONE T-SHIRTS OF YOUR CHOICE (not including the Limited Edition T-shirt of the Knight) + 2 THRONE CAPS + 1 THRONE JACKET EMBROIDERED + 3 DIGITAL COPIES OF THE GAME + YOU DESIGN A NON PLAYING CHARACTER NPC + YOU DESIGN THE WEAPONS + YOU NAME A NEW COUNTRY + VIP THANK YOU NOTE IN THE GAME CREDIT

Previous reward tier + A 2'X2' THRONE POSTER SIGNED BY THE ENTIRE THRONE TEAM + YOU BECOME A CUSTOM PORTRAIT IN THE GAME + YOU CREATE AND DESIGN 5 NEW NPCs OF YOUR CHOICE (within reasons of course) + GET AN ART PRINT OF YOUR PORTRAIT SIGNED BY THE THRONE TEAM + A LIMITED EDITION T-SHIRT OF THE KNIGHT NUMBERED AND SIGNED BY THE THRONE TEAM and NATHANIAL HAMIL + VIP THANK YOU NOTE IN THE GAME CREDIT

Previous reward tier + A 18''X11'' ORIGINAL ART RENDER SIGNED BY THE ENTIRE THRONE TEAM + ZEBRALIGHTNING STUDIOS GAMES FOR LIFE (next 20 years) + CUSTOM PORTRAITS WITH THE ZEBRALIGHTNING STUDIOS ENTIRE TEAM + 1 HR OF SPECIAL PHOTOGRAPHY SESSION OF CHOICE + DESIGN A COUNTRY FOR THE THRONE I, II, AND III + 5 THRONE T-SHIRTS AND 5 THRONE CAPS + 3 THRONE JACKETS EMBROIDERED + AN EXTRA T-SHIRT WITH THE WORD THRONE THE ONE PRINTED ON THE BACK OF IT + 5 EXTRA COPIES OF THE THRONE GAME I, II, AND III + AN INVITATION TO ATTEND THE RELEASE PARTY FOR THRONE, THRONE LEGEND AND THRONE BIZANTIS (You are responsible for airfare to and from our Colorado location, the helicopter ride from the airport to our studio is on us) +  VIP THANK YOU NOTE IN THE GAME CREDIT + CREDIT AS EXECUTIVE PRODUCER IN OUR GAME CREDIT. This is the Ultimate Package for the absolute fan who wants to be a part of our future success. Everything in this package is signed by the entire ZebraLightning Studios team, or just the Throne development team, your choice of it.  Throne II (Legend) and Throne III (Bizantis) as part of the Throne Trilogy will be developed if we reach our necessary stretched goals. The party dates will be determined as we get closer to completion of the game.
